name: Choo Charles Survival Game
description: We are representing the charles train adventure in the world of Scary Games. You are alone in the jungle, you have a little time to complete the task in order to win, you have to hurry before the scary spider finds you. Some surprises are waiting on the way,  you will find scrapes to Upgrade yourself and your weapons to fight with her and survive in this gameplay. So be careful in survival adventures,The monster will attack you if you are close to them.
